outputs.name: rooms
outputs.description: The input Rooms with their loads edited.

inputs.name: _rooms
inputs.description:
Honeybee Rooms to which the input program should be assigned.
This can also be a Honeybee Model for which all Rooms will be
assigned the ProgramType.

inputs.name: _program
inputs.description: A ProgramType object to apply to the input rooms,

name: HB Apply ProgramType
description:
Apply ProgramType objects to Rooms or a Model.
